description:
Gokudo signs up for the `King`s Race`, having no idea what he is getting himself into.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Camina o revienta, empieza la carrera por el reino.
Noru ka Soru ka!? Kokuou Race ni Dechau zo! no Koto
The King`s Race: Ready or Not, Here I Come!
のるかそるか!? 国王レースに出ちゃうぞ! のこと
